item.title: New Year's Eve 2025: Watch countries ring in the year
item.description: The Pacific island nation of Kiribati was the first country to ring in 2025, its 133,500 citizens celebrating the new year at 5 a.m. ET on Tuesday.

item.title: Victim burned to death in horrific subway attack identified
item.description: A woman who died after being set on fire on a New York City subway train this month was identified, according to police.

item.title: WATCH: 2025 welcomed in Hong Kong
item.description: Hong Kong said goodbye to 2024 in a big way with an epic fireworks display.

item.title: WATCH: Bangkok says hello to 2025
item.description: Thousands gathered in and around the IconSiam shopping mall to ring in the new year.

item.title: These states will raise the minimum wage in 2025
item.description: Ten states will offer a minimum wage of $15 an hour or higher.
